00051 /*
00052  * Pointer to function that will handle session closes.
00053  */
00054 static void (*close_handler)(int session) = NULL;

00057 /* Public data definitions.                                                   */

00059 
00060 char *llp_states[] = {
00061                 "CLOSED",
00062                 "CONNECTING",
00063                 "BEING CONNECTED",
00064                 "ESTABLISHED",
00065                 "CLOSE WAIT",
00066                 "TIME WAIT"
00067 };
00068 
00069 llp_session_t llp_sessions[LLP_MAX_SESSIONS];
00070 
00071 pthread_mutex_t llp_sessions_mutexes[LLP_MAX_SESSIONS];
00072 
00073 /*============================================================================*/
00074 /* Public functions implementations.                                          */
00075 /*============================================================================*/           
00076 
00077 int llp_sessions_initialize() {
00078         int i;
00079         
00080         /* Initializing session information. */
00081         memset(llp_sessions, 0, sizeof(llp_sessions));
00082         
00083         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "session information initialized.");
00084 
00085         /* Creating mutexes. */
00086 
00087         for (i = 0; i < LLP_MAX_SESSIONS; i++) {
00088                 if (pthread_mutex_init(&llp_sessions_mutexes[i], NULL) > 0) {
00089                         liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error allocating mutex: %s.",
00090                                         strerror(errno));
00091                         return LLP_ERROR;
00092                 }
00093         }
00094         
00095         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "mutex initialized.");
00096         
00097         return LLP_OK;
00098 }
00099 /******************************************************************************/
00100 void llp_sessions_finalize() {
00101         int i;
00102         
00103         for (i = 0; i < LLP_MAX_SESSIONS; i++) {
00104                 pthread_mutex_lock(&llp_sessions_mutexes[i]);
00105                 llp_close_session(i);
00106                 pthread_mutex_unlock(&llp_sessions_mutexes[i]);         
00107         }
00108         
00109         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "session information resources freed.");
00110         
00111         for (i = 0; i < LLP_MAX_SESSIONS; i++) {
00112                 pthread_mutex_destroy(&llp_sessions_mutexes[i]);
00113         }
00114         
00115         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "resources freed.");
00116         
00117 }
00118 /******************************************************************************/
00119 int llp_set_cipher_in_key(int session, u_char *key) {
00120 
00121         /* Freeing possible existant key. */
00122         if (llp_sessions[session].cipher_in_key != NULL) {
00123                 liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK,
00124                                 "cipher_in_key already exists, freeing.");
00125                 free(llp_sessions[session].cipher_in_key);
00126                 llp_sessions[session].cipher_in_key = NULL;
00127         }
00128         
00129         /* Checking if a cipher is assigned to this session. */
00130         if (llp_sessions[session].cipher == NULL) {
00131                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK,
00132                                 "no cipher found for this session.");
00133                 return LLP_ERROR;
00134         }
00135         
00136         /* Creating a new key. */
00137         llp_sessions[session].cipher_in_key =
00138                         (u_char *)malloc(llp_sessions[session].cipher->key_length);
00139         if (llp_sessions[session].cipher_in_key == NULL) {
00140                 liblog_fatal(LAYER_LINK, "error in malloc: %s.",
00141                                 strerror(errno));
00142                 return LLP_ERROR;
00143         }
00144         memcpy(llp_sessions[session].cipher_in_key, key,
00145                         llp_sessions[session].cipher->key_length);
00146         
00147         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "new decryption key set.");
00148         
00149         return LLP_OK;
00150 }
00151 /******************************************************************************/
00152 int llp_set_cipher_in_iv(int session, u_char *iv) {
00153         
00154         /* Freeing possible existant iv. */
00155         if (llp_sessions[session].cipher_in_iv != NULL) {

00161

00165                                 "no cipher found for this session.");

00252         
00253         /* Freeing possible existant key. */
00254         if (llp_sessions[session].mac_in_key != NULL) {

00261         /* Checking if a MAC function is assigned to this session. */

00263                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK,
00264                                 "no MAC function found for this session.");
00265                 return LLP_ERROR;
00266         }
00267         
00268         /* Creating a new iv. */
00269         llp_sessions[session].mac_in_key =
00270                         (u_char *)malloc(llp_sessions[session].mac->key_length);

00279         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "new MAC verification key set.");
00280         
00281         return LLP_OK;

00316 /******************************************************************************/
00317 int llp_set_verifier(int session, u_char *verifier) {
00318         
00319         /* Freeing possible existant key. */
00320         if (llp_sessions[session].verifier != NULL) {
00321                 liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK,
00322                                 "verifier already exists, freeing.");
00323                 free(llp_sessions[session].verifier);
00324                 llp_sessions[session].verifier = NULL;
00325         }
00326         
00327         /* Checking if a MAC function is assigned to this session. */
00328         if (llp_sessions[session].hash == NULL) {
00329                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK,
00330                                 "no hash function found for this session.");
00331                 return LLP_ERROR;
00332         }
00333         
00334         /* Creating a new key. */
00335         llp_sessions[session].verifier =
00336                         (u_char *)malloc(llp_sessions[session].hash->length);
00337         if (llp_sessions[session].verifier == NULL) {
00338                 liblog_fatal(LAYER_LINK, "error in malloc: %s.",
00339                                 strerror(errno));
00340                 return LLP_ERROR;
00341         }
00342         memcpy(llp_sessions[session].verifier, verifier,
00343                         llp_sessions[session].hash->length);
00344         
00345         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "new verifier set.");
00346         
00347         return LLP_OK;
00348 }
00349 /******************************************************************************/
00350 void llp_close_session(int session) {
00351         
00352         if (llp_sessions[session].cipher_in_key != NULL) {
00353                 liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK,
00354                                 "freeing memory allocated to cipher_in_key.");
00355                 free(llp_sessions[session].cipher_in_key);
00356                 llp_sessions[session].cipher_in_key = NULL;
00357         }
00358         
00359         if (llp_sessions[session].cipher_in_iv != NULL) {
00360                 liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK,
00361                                 "freeing memory allocated to cipher_in_iv.");
00362                 free(llp_sessions[session].cipher_in_iv);
00363                 llp_sessions[session].cipher_in_iv = NULL;
00364         }
00365 
00366         if (llp_sessions[session].cipher_out_key != NULL) {
00367                 liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK,
00368                                 "freeing memory allocated to cipher_out_key.");
00369                 free(llp_sessions[session].cipher_out_key);
00370                 llp_sessions[session].cipher_out_key = NULL;
00371         }
00372         
00373         if (llp_sessions[session].cipher_out_iv != NULL) {
00374                 liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK,
00375                                 "freeing memory allocated to cipher_out_iv.");
00376                 free(llp_sessions[session].cipher_out_iv);
00377                 llp_sessions[session].cipher_out_iv = NULL;
00378         }
00379         
00380         if (llp_sessions[session].mac_in_key != NULL) {
00381                 liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK,
00382                                 "freeing memory allocated to mac_in_key.");
00383                 free(llp_sessions[session].mac_in_key);
00384                 llp_sessions[session].mac_in_key = NULL;
00385         }
00386         
00387         if (llp_sessions[session].mac_out_key != NULL) {
00388                 liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK,
00389                                 "freeing memory allocated to mac_out_key.");
00390                 free(llp_sessions[session].mac_out_key);
00391                 llp_sessions[session].mac_out_key = NULL;
00392         }
00393         
00394         if (llp_sessions[session].verifier != NULL) {
00395                 liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK,
00396                                 "freeing memory allocated to verifier.");
00397                 free(llp_sessions[session].verifier);
00398                 llp_sessions[session].verifier = NULL;
00399         }
00400         
00401         llp_sessions[session].state = LLP_STATE_CLOSED;
00402         llp_set_node_inactive(session); 
00403 
00404         /* Calling the registered callback function. */
00405         if (close_handler != NULL) {
00406                 close_handler(session);
00407         }
00408         
00409         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "session %d is now in CLOSED state.", session);
00410 }
00411 /******************************************************************************/
00412 int llp_get_free_session(int next_state) {
00413         int i;
00414         int found = 0;
00415 
00416         for (i = 0; i < LLP_MAX_SESSIONS && !found; i++) {
00417                 if (pthread_mutex_trylock(&llp_sessions_mutexes[i]) != EBUSY) {
00418                         if (llp_sessions[i].state == LLP_STATE_CLOSED) {
00419                                 liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "free session %d found.", i);
00420                                 llp_sessions[i].state = next_state;
00421                                 llp_sessions[i].hunt_time = 0;
00422                                 llp_sessions[i].silence = 0;                            
00423                                 found = 1;
00424                         }
00425                         pthread_mutex_unlock(&llp_sessions_mutexes[i]);
00426                 }
00427         }
00428         
00429         return (found ? (i - 1) : LLP_ERROR);
00430 }
00431 /******************************************************************************/
00432 int llp_get_last_error(int session) {
00433         int error;
00434 
00435         pthread_mutex_lock(&llp_sessions_mutexes[session]);
00436         error = llp_sessions[session].error;
00437         pthread_mutex_unlock(&llp_sessions_mutexes[session]);   
00438         
00439         return error;
00440 }
00441 /******************************************************************************/
00442 void llp_handle_timeouts() {
00443         int i;
00444         
00445         for (i = 0; i < LLP_MAX_SESSIONS; i++) {
00446                 /* If timeout is zero, the timeout is disabled. */
00447                 if (pthread_mutex_trylock(&llp_sessions_mutexes[i]) == 0) {
00448                         if (llp_sessions[i].state == LLP_STATE_CLOSED) {
00449                                 pthread_mutex_unlock(&llp_sessions_mutexes[i]);
00450                                 continue;
00451                         }
00452                         if (llp_sessions[i].timeout > 0) {
00453                                 llp_sessions[i].timeout--;
00454                                 if (llp_sessions[i].timeout == 0) {
00455                                         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "session %d timed out.", i);
00456                                         llp_close_session(i);
00457                                 }
00458                         }
00459                         /* Seeing if this session is expired. */
00460                         llp_sessions[i].alive++;
00461                         if (llp_sessions[i].alive >= (llp_get_expiration_time() *
00462                                         LLP_TIME_TICKS_PER_SECOND)) {
00463                                 liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "session %d expired out.", i);
00464                                 llp_disconnect(i);
00465                         }                               
00466                         pthread_mutex_unlock(&llp_sessions_mutexes[i]);
00467                 }
00468         }
00469 }
00470 /******************************************************************************/
00471 void llp_handle_silence() {
00472         int i;
00473         
00474         for (i = LLP_MAX_SESSIONS-1; i >= 0; i--) {
00475                 /* If timeout is zero, the timeout is disabled. */
00476                 if (pthread_mutex_trylock(&llp_sessions_mutexes[i]) == 0) {
00477                         llp_sessions[i].silence++;
00478                         if (llp_sessions[i].silence >= LLP_T_SILENT) {
00479                                 if (llp_sessions[i].state == LLP_STATE_ESTABLISHED) {
00480                                         llp_keep_session_alive(i);      
00481                                 } else {
00482                                         if (llp_sessions[i].state == LLP_STATE_CLOSE_WAIT) {
00483                                                 llp_disconnect(i);
00484                                         }
00485                                 }
00486                         }
00487                         pthread_mutex_unlock(&llp_sessions_mutexes[i]);
00488                 }
00489         }
00490 }
00491 /******************************************************************************/
00492 void llp_handle_connections() {
00493         int i;
00494         int active;
00495         int min_connections;
00496         
00497         min_connections = llp_get_min_connections();
00498         active = llp_get_active_sessions_counter();
00499 
00500         if (active < min_connections) {
00501                 for (i = 0; i < min_connections - active; i++) {
00502                         /* Break if the call fail (subsequent calls will fail too). */
00503                         if (llp_connect_any() == LLP_ERROR) {
00504                                 break;
00505                         }
00506                 }
00507         }
00508 }
00509 /******************************************************************************/
00510 int llp_register_close(void (*handler)(int session)) {
00511         if (close_handler == NULL) {
00512                 close_handler = handler;
00513                 return LINK_OK;
00514         }
00515         
00516         return LINK_ERROR;
00517 }
00518 /******************************************************************************/
00519 int llp_unregister_close() {
00520         if (close_handler == NULL) {
00521                 return LINK_ERROR;
00522         }
00523         
00524         close_handler = NULL;
00525         return LINK_OK;
00526 }
00527 /******************************************************************************/
